verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> [Tmiz-MorA Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. of David יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD בְּעָזְּךָ֥ <WH5797> be-'az-ze-Cha in thy strength יִשְׂמַח־ <WH8055> yis-mach- shall joy מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech; The king וּ֝בִישׁ֥וּעָתְךָ֗ <WH3444> u-vi-Shu-'a-te-cha, and in thy salvation מַה־ <WH4100> mah- how יָּ֥גֶיל <WH1523> Ya-geil shall he rejoice מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. how greatly

תַּאֲוַ֣ת <WH8378> ta-'a-Vat desire לִ֭בּוֹ <WH3820> lib-bo him his heart's נָתַ֣תָּה <WH5414> na-Tat-tah Thou hast given לּ֑וֹ lo; וַאֲרֶ֥שֶׁת <WH782> va-'a-Re-shet the request שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <WH8193> fa-Tav, of his lips בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- have not מָנַ֥עְתָּ <WH4513> ma-Na'-ta and hast not withholden סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for תְ֭קַדְּמֶנּוּ <WH6923> Te-kad-de-men-nu For thou preventest בִּרְכ֣וֹת <WH1293> bir-Chot him with the blessings ט֑וֹב <WH2896> Tov; of goodness תָּשִׁ֥ית <WH7896> ta-Shit thou settest לְ֝רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <WH7218> le-ro-Sho, on his head עֲטֶ֣רֶת <WH5850> 'a-Te-ret a crown פָּֽז׃ <WH6337> Paz. of pure gold

חַיִּ֤ים׀ <WH2416> chai-Yim life שָׁאַ֣ל <WH7592> sha-'Al He asked מִ֭מְּךָ <WH4480> Mi-me-cha at נָתַ֣תָּה <WH5414> na-Tat-tah of thee [and] thou gavest לּ֑וֹ lo; אֹ֥רֶךְ <WH753> 'O-rech [it] him [even] length יָ֝מִ֗ים <WH3117> ya-Mim, of days עוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> o-Lam for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> va-'Ed. and ever

גָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol [is] great כְּ֭בוֹדוֹ <WH3519> ke-vo-do His glory בִּישׁוּעָתֶ֑ךָ <WH3444> bi-shu-'a-Te-cha; in thy salvation ה֥וֹד <WH1935> Hod honour וְ֝הָדָר <WH1926> Ve-ha-dor and majesty תְּשַׁוֶּ֥ה <WH7737> te-shav-Veh hast thou laid עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lav. and

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for תְשִׁיתֵ֣הוּ <WH7896> te-shi-Te-hu For thou hast made בְרָכ֣וֹת <WH1293> ve-ra-Chot him most blessed לָעַ֑ד <WH5703> la-'Ad; for ever תְּחַדֵּ֥הוּ <WH2302> te-chad-De-hu thou hast made בְ֝שִׂמְחָ֗ה <WH8057> ve-sim-Chah, him exceeding glad אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- in פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha. with thy countenance

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For הַ֭מֶּלֶךְ <WH4428> Ham-Me-lech For the king בֹּטֵ֣חַ <WH982> bo-Te-ach trusteth בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; in the LORD וּבְחֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> u-ve-Che-sed and through the mercy עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <WH5945> el-Yon, of the most High בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- lest יִמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> yim-Mot. he shall not be moved

תִּמְצָ֣א <WH4672> tim-Tza shall find out יָ֭דְךָ <WH3027> Ya-de-cha Thine hand לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-cha; all thine enemies יְ֝מִֽינְךָ <WH3225> Ye-mi-ne-cha thy right hand תִּמְצָ֥א <WH4672> tim-Tza shall find out שֹׂנְאֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8130> so-ne-'Ei-cha. those that hate

תְּשִׁיתֵ֤מוֹ׀ <WH7896> te-shi-Te-mov Thou shalt make כְּתַנּ֥וּר <WH8574> ke-tan-Nur oven אֵשׁ֮ <WH784> 'esh them as a fiery לְעֵ֪ת <WH6256> le-'Et in the time פָּ֫נֶ֥יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha of thine anger יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בְּאַפּ֣וֹ <WH639> be-'ap-Po in his wrath יְבַלְּעֵ֑ם <WH1104> ye-val-le-'Em; shall swallow them up וְֽתֹאכְלֵ֥ם <WH398> ve-to-che-Lem shall devour אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> 'Esh. and the fire

פִּ֭רְיָמוֹ <WH6529> pir-ya-mo Their fruit מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz from the earth תְּאַבֵּ֑ד <WH6> te-'ab-Bed; shalt thou destroy וְ֝זַרְעָ֗ם <WH2233> ve-zar-'Am, and their seed מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> mib-be-Nei from among the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> 'a-Dam. of men

כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- Though נָט֣וּ <WH5186> na-Tu For they intended עָלֶ֣יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha against רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah; evil חָֽשְׁב֥וּ <WH2803> cha-she-Vu against thee they imagined מְ֝זִמָּ֗ה <WH4209> me-zim-Mah, a mischievous device בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- They will not יוּכָֽלוּ׃ <WH3201> yu-Cha-lu. [which] they are not able

כִּ֭י <WH3588> ki for תְּשִׁיתֵ֣מוֹ <WH7896> te-shi-Te-mov Therefore shalt thou make שֶׁ֑כֶם <WH7926> She-chem; them turn their back בְּ֝מֵֽיתָרֶ֗יךָ <WH4340> be-mei-ta-Rei-cha, [thine arrows] upon thy strings תְּכוֹנֵ֥ן <WH3559> te-cho-Nen [when] thou shalt make ready עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- at פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> pe-nei-Hem. against the face

ר֣וּמָה <WH7311> Ru-mah Be thou exalted יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD בְּעֻזֶּ֑ךָ <WH5797> ve-'uz-Ze-cha; in thine own strength נָשִׁ֥ירָה <WH7891> na-Shi-rah [so] will we sing וּֽ֝נְזַמְּרָה <WH2167> U-ne-zam-me-rah and praise גְּבוּרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1369> ge-vu-ra-Te-cha. thy power
